sentences.sContent: His head hit the floor with a sickening thud .
sentences.sCn: 他的头撞在地上，发出一声让人心惊的闷响。

sentences.sContent: She ran up the stairs, her bare feet thudding on the wood.
sentences.sCn: 她跑上楼梯，光脚在木头上发出噔噔的声音。

trans.tranOther: the low sound made by a heavy object hitting something else

trans.tranCn: 砰的一声掉下；发出砰声
trans.tranOther: If something thuds somewhere, it makes a dull sound, usually when it falls onto or hits something else
